title: A Key & A Kite: StarTalk Live! With Benjamin Franklin
description:
How does lightning work? On this episode, Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Chuck break down the legendary science and inventions of Benjamin Franklin, live with chief editor of The Benjamin Franklin Papers, Ellen Cohn and Benjamin Franklin himself!

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://startalkmedia.com/show/a-key-a-kite-startalk-live-with-benjamin-franklin/

Thanks to our Patrons Andrew Herron, Bhargava Kandada, and Mark Roop for supporting us this week.

Photo Credit: Hansueli Krapf, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson, Chuck Nice, Ellen Cohn, Mitchell Kramer)
